EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_Forrester_TEIofPCF_AR_Q317.Download Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for viewing the Total Economic Impact™ of Pivotal Cloud Foundry report
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thank you for viewing the The Total Economic Impact™ of Pivotal Cloud Foundry Forrester study, we hope it inspires you to start building software people love! For more resources from Pivotal, check out our resources page <[[https://content.pivotal.io/resources]]>, where you can find customer case studies, white papers, webinars, analyst reports, and eBooks. And please stay in touch <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>, we love hearing from you! Thank you, The Pivotal Team For more on everything from Spring to cloud-native to accelerating your application development and more, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]>, taking place this September 24-27th in Washington, D.C. Use code S1P_Discount_100 <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]> and save $100 off the price of admission.
